definitions.definition: A Sindhi-speaking person from or residing in Sindh .

main_definition: A Sindhi-speaking person from or residing in Sindh .

definitions.definition: An Indo-Aryan language spoken in four main dialects in Pakistan and India . There are around 35 million Sindhi speakers in Sindh سنڌ and more than 40 million throughout the world. Sindhi is written with a modified Arabic script that has 52 letters, and in a modified Devanagari script too.

main_definition: An Indo-Aryan language spoken in four main dialects in Pakistan and India . There are around 35 million Sindhi speakers in Sindh سنڌ and more than 40 million throughout the world. Sindhi is written with a modified Arabic script that has 52 letters, and in a modified Devanagari script too.
